new.title: Cypress Demo with E2E Test
new.introduction: This demo helps user to understand cypress diff Features
new.body: Most end-to-end testing tools are Selenium-based, which is why they all share the same problems. To make Cypress different, we built a new architecture from the ground up. Whereas Selenium executes remote commands through the network, Cypress runs in the same run-loop as your application.
